p: Starting from compound 2c (0.248 g, 1.12 × 10 −3 mol) and using acetic anhydride (0.16 mL, 1.68 mmol), compound 2d was obtained as a light yellow oil (0.248 g, 84% yield). R f = 0.29 (ethyl acetate/light petroleum 1:10). 1H NMR (CDCl 3, 400 MHz): δ H = 2.02 (3H, s, CO 2C H 3 ), 2.11 (2H, quint, J = 6.8 Hz, OCH 2CH 2CH 2CO 2CH 3), 3.30 (2H, d, J = 6.8 Hz, CH 2Ph), 3.81 (3H, s, OC H 3 ), 4.05 (2H, t, J = 6.4 Hz, OC H 2 CH 2CH 2CO 2CH 3), 4.25 (2H, t, J = 6.4 Hz, OCH 2CH 2CH 2CO 2CH 3), 5.01–5.08 (2H, m, CH=CH 2), 5.88–5.98 (1H, m, CH=CH 2), 6.67–6.69 (2H, m, H-3 and H-5), 6.80 (1H, d, J = 8.0 Hz, H-6) ppm. 13C NMR (CDCl 3, 100.6 MHz): δ C = 20.66 (CO 2 CH 3), 28.43 (OCH 2 CH 2CH 2CO 2CH 3), 39.57 ( CH 2Ph), 55.64 (O CH 3), 61.18 (OCH 2CH 2 CH 2CO 2CH 3), 65.60 (O CH 2CH 2CH 2CO 2CH 3), 112.30 (C-3), 113.53 (C-6), 115.38 (CH= CH 2), 120.26 (C-5), 133.03 (C-4), 137.40 ( CH=CH 2), 146.38 (C-1), 149.35 (C-2), 170.76 ( CO 2CH 3) ppm. HRMS: m/z (ESI) calculated for C 15H 20NaO 4 [M+Na] + = 287.1254; found = 287.1253.
